profile_positions.company: University of Minho - Center of Biological Engineering
profile_positions.description: Post-doctoral research grant from the portuguese Foundation for Science and Technology (FCT) under the theme "Virulence traits of Acinetobacter baumannii triggered by host interaction".
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow

company.name: University of Minho - Center of Biological Engineering (CEB)

profile_positions.company: University of Minho - Center of Biological Engineering (CEB)
profile_positions.description: Member of the project ““BioHealth: Biotechnology and Bioengineering approaches to improve health quality” (NORTE-07-0124-FEDER-000027) of the Integrated Program IC&DT “BiO2Norte - Biotechnology and Bioengineering for the Quality of Life and Sustainable Development". Responsabilities: development of cells and tissue models to assess the interaction of biofilm yeast and bacteria with human host cells; development and implementation of methods to assess the degree of invasion, injury and cytotoxicity of human tissue when interacting with microbial cells, based on CSLM, flow cytometry and omic tools.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow

company.name: University of Minho - Center of Biological Engineering

profile_positions.company: University of Minho - Center of Biological Engineering
profile_positions.description: Member of the PhageFoodSafe project (“Development of a phage-based product for the control of Salmonella and Campylobacter in food and food processing surfaces”), involved in the genetic modification of bacteriophages to increase the efficiency of control of Salmonella and Campylobacter in surfaces.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow

company.name: University of Minho - Center of Biological Engineering (CEB)

profile_positions.description:
PhD in Biomedical Engineering, under the theme “Expression and characterization
of a therapeutic monoclonal antibody in mammalian cells”.
profile_positions.title: PhD Student

profile_positions.description:
Member of the MAbExpress project called “Development of a technological platform for
the production of biopharmaceuticals in animal cells”. Involved in the identification and
establishment of a cell line for the production of a monoclonal antibody, both in static and
suspension culture conditions; optimization of the culture medium for cell growth in serum-free
conditions through factorial design; optimization of culture parameters in rocked
systems; evaluation of the Wave bioreactor by comparison with a stirred tank bioreactor.
profile_positions.title: Research Fellow

profile_positions.description: Comparison of methods to determine antifungal susceptibility.
